title: Harrowing Legacy Skins Vault Question
body:
I just read that the past legacy skins for "the Harrowing" are to be released sometime this patch when the slayer/zombie skins go live. 

If this is true.......

Will reaper Soraka be included with these skins? I hear it is not considered to be a Harrowing skin (just that it came out around the time).

Riot this is her best skin IMO so please release it with the others. I will gladly spend money on this skin. 

Please Riot!!!!
